description:
Frank Turner talks about the ways musicians made a living over time.
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

During an interview at The Current, singer-songwriter @FrankTurner  provides historical perspective on the ways musicians have earned a living, noting that perhaps we are seeing a reversion to type. "If you want to make a living as a musician, you're either playing shows or you're sponsored by somebody in some way, shape, or form," Turner says, "both of which are respectable ways of making a living."

#frankturner #musichistory
title: Frank Turner reflects on how musicians' livelihoods have changed over time #shorts #interview

description:
The Secret Sisters – I Can Never Be Without You Anymore live in The Current studio
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

The Secret Sisters’ fifth studio album, "Mind, Man, Medicine," released on March 29, 2024, on New West Records. As part of the record release, The Secret Sisters — Laura Rogers and Lydia Slagle — visited the Twin Cities in May for two sold-out shows at the Parkway Theater in Minneapolis. Between shows, The Secret Sisters visited The Current for a session hosted by Bill DeVille. Watch The Secret Sisters' perform "I Can Never Be Without You Anymore" above.

Musicians
Laura Rogers – vocals
Lydia Slagle – guitar, vocals

Credits
Guests – @thesecretsistersband 
Host – Bill DeVille
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Eric Xu Romani

title: Secret Sisters – I Can Never Be Without You Anymore (live for The Current)
